## Special Thanks

### AI Assistants
- **Claude (Anthropic)**: Code generation assistance, documentation review, architecture design
- **GitHub Copilot**: Code completion and suggestions

### Open Source Projects
EnterpriseHub builds on the shoulders of giants:

- **Streamlit**: Web framework for data apps
- **Anthropic**: Claude AI API for advanced insights
- **Pandas**: Data manipulation and analysis
- **Plotly**: Interactive visualizations
- **Yahoo Finance**: Real-time financial data
- **TextBlob**: Natural language processing
- **pytest**: Testing framework
- **Black, isort, flake8, mypy**: Code quality tools

---

## How to Contribute

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines on:
- Submitting pull requests
- Reporting issues
- Improving documentation
- Adding new features

---

## Attribution

If you've contributed to EnterpriseHub and want to be listed here, please:
1. Add your name to the appropriate section
2. Include a brief description of your contributions
3. Submit a pull request with your changes

We appreciate all contributions, big and small!

---

## Code of Conduct

All contributors are expected to adhere to our Code of Conduct (see CONTRIBUTING.md). We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment for everyone.
